thread.title: Hackers use radio waves to silently control Apple's Siri, Android's Google Now

title: Hackers use radio waves to silently control Apple's Siri, Android's Google Now
text:
Hackers use radio waves to silently control Apple's Siri, Android's Google Now 
Published By: AppleInsider.com - Today 
A newly spotlighted hack utilizes an iPhone or Android handset -- with headphones plugged in -- to remotely and silently access the smartpho...
